data.title: Jason Terry: Breaking News, Rumors & Highlights
data.meta_description: Jason Terry rumors, news and videos from the best sources on the web.
data.text:
'Should’ve arrested you for accessory to murder!' Norris Cole recalls iconic LeBron James dunk on Jason Terry during heated Miami vs Boston series

LeBron James was a dominant force during his time in South Beach. Teaming up with Dwyane Wade and Chris Bosh, James had it all to win his first two championships.

Luka Doncic Passes Jason Terry for 2nd on Mavs 3-Pointers Made List

The Dallas Mavericks extended their winning streak to three games with a 127-92 thumping of the Chicago Bulls on Monday night, and although Luka Doncic saw his league-record streak of 30-point triple-doubles end, he still recorded his seventh consecutive triple-double and made some team history as well.

Luka Doncic Passes Jason Terry on Mavs’ All-Time Scoring List

Luka Doncic has been on a tear for the Dallas Mavericks in December while also helping his injury-plagued team keep its head above water in the West with a 5-4 record in games he’s played in.

Luka Doncic Primed to Pass Jason Terry on Mavs’ All-Time Scoring List

Luka Doncic has been on a tear for the Dallas Mavericks in December, averaging 35.7 points, 9.2 rebounds, 11.4 assists and 1.2 steals while helping his injury-plagued team keep its head above water in the West with a 5-4 record so far.

Utah Jazz announce new coaching hires and changes

It’s a new season with new coaches on the bench The Utah Jazz announced coaching changes for the upcoming 2023-24 season. Here’s what their new coaching staff will look like.

Ex-Mavericks champion facing unusual lawsuit

Some five years after his NBA career ended, Jason Terry is facing a fairly unusual lawsuit. Priscilla DeGregory of the New York Post reported Monday that the ex-NBA guard Terry is being accused of not paying for a diamond-encrusted Rolex watch worth $25,000, according to court documents.

Damian Lillard Passes Jason Terry For 65th On All Time Points List

One guard jets past another. Portland Trail Blazers point guard Damian Lillard has passed another name on his way up the NBA All-Time Scoring List, passing 2011 NBA Champion Jason Terry for 65th place overall.

Utah Jazz vs. Portland Trail Blazers preview, prediction, pick for 1/25: Dame looks to move up 3-pointer list

Damian Lillard continues to build his reputation as one of the top long-range shooters in NBA history. Lillard has moved into seventh place on the all-time 3-pointers list and is taking aim at sixth-place Vince Carter when the Portland Trail Blazers host the Utah Jazz on Wednesday night.

Who has made the most three-pointers in NBA history?

The three-point shot was added in during the 1979-80 season. The rest, as they say, is history.

Jason Terry provides update on Nate Robinson's treatment for kidney failure

Fellow former Boston Celtics guard and Seattle native Jason Terry gave a quick update on Nate Robinson's health in the video below. The part on Nate begins at the 1 minute mark.

Could Christian Wood Be Mavs' Next Jason Terry?

The Dallas Mavericks moved on from Kristaps Porzinigs ahead of the midseason trade deadline earlier this year. It didn't take long for them to take a chance on another dynamic offensive threat at the center position.

Jason Terry Once Hilariously Explained How The Mavericks Were Beating The Lakers In 2011: "We've Been Able To Penetrate Their Bigs, Get Deep, Suck The D In.."

Jason Terry had a hilarious response when asked why the Dallas Mavericks were having so much success against the Los Angeles Lakers during the 2011 playoffs.

Gilbert Arenas Reveals That The Worst He Ever Got Dunked On Was By Jason Terry

Gilbert Arenas talks about the time when he accidentally helped Jason Terry dunk on him. Gilbert Arenas was one of the best guards in the NBA for a couple of years in the mid-2000s, as he seemingly came out of nowhere to terrorize opposing backcourts.

Former Sixers Guard Andre Miller Lands Coaching Job

A former Philadelphia 76ers veteran is set to re-enter the NBA in a coaching role. On Wednesday, ESPN’s Adrian Wojnarowski reported that former Sixers guard Andre Miller is finalizing a deal to become the head coach of the Grand Rapids Gold.

Report: Jazz Hiring Jason Terry as Assistant Coach

On Saturday, Shams Charania of The Athletic reported that current Grand Rapids Gold head coach Jason Terry is finalizing a deal to become an assistant with the Utah Jazz.

Report: Jazz to hire Jason Terry as assistant coach

The Jazz are finalizing a deal to make retired former NBA guard Jason Terry an assistant on new head coach Will Hardy’s staff.

Report: Jazz to Interview Jason Terry for Head Coach Vacancy

According to The Athletic's Shams Charania, a new candidate to succeed Quin Snyder as head coach has emerged for the Utah Jazz. On Friday, Charania tweeted “The Utah Jazz have received permission to interview NBA G League Grand Rapids Golds coach Jason Terry for the franchise’s head coaching job.

Jazz to interview Jason Terry for head coaching job

The Jazz have received permission to interview former NBA guard Jason Terry for their head coaching job.

Jason Terry to become new head coach of G League's Grand Rapids Gold

The Grand Rapids Gold, G League affiliate of the Denver Nuggets, are set to have a new head coach.

Source: Dallas Mavs New Coach Jason Kidd ‘Visiting’ With Potential Staffers J.J. Barea & Jason Terry

New Dallas Mavericks head coach Jason Kidd has visited with former Dallas teammates J.J. Barea and Jason Terry about positions with their firmer club, a source close to the situation tells DallasBasketball.com. Kidd on Friday agreed to replace Rick Carlisle as the Dallas head coach.

Jason Terry Shuts Down Rumors That Luka Doncic Wants To Leave Dallas Mavericks

Even though he hasn't been around the league for long, it's pretty clear that Luka Doncic is a superstar already. He's one of the new faces of the NBA and as such, he'll be linked with multiple trade rumors year in and year out.

Jason Terry Says He '100-Percent' Could Coach Mavs Right Now

For the first time in 13 seasons the Dallas Mavericks will not have Rick Carlisle as their head coach. It remains to be see who will end up being his replacement.

Every NBA player who played in his 40s

Being a professional athlete is hard. That’s not a bold statement. However, it’s even more difficult to play into your late 30s, and sticking around in the pros into your 40s, if you aren’t a bowler or a golfer, is a truly rare feat.
